archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.5.12b: b) involve representatives from key areas of the organisation (e.g. executive management, compliance, business owners, legal and privacy departments, IT management, and the information security function)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
